tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,Emergency Dental Treatment,Dental Examinations,Dental Cleaning,Dental Checkup (General),
review:
Usually we tend to avoid Dental issues until they become painful. Most of us are unaware of these issues and we think everything is alright. When it gets painful or sensitive we tend to find a dentist and we remain scared of the treatments. 
I always thought that there can be nothing wrong till it is not paining. I found denstists scarier and all treatments painful, Even the sound of the instrument would irritate me and the treatment chair would  scare me to death. 
I am very happy with diagnosis and treatment provided 
I had a bad case of dental cavities, plaque, and decay which I was not even aware. I was explained well and treated upon with patience. Doctor adjusted my appointments as per my erratic work schedule and accommodated my request of Sunday visit 
I am writing this review post 3 months of my treatment and after achieving due satisfaction. 
I had a liberty to call the doctor and explain my issue over phone too. I do not think these days any other doctor would be so dedicated and would be so helpful. 
If you want peace of mind and value for any of your dental treatment you can be assured with Dr Rachna Bhama
reply_text: Thank you Devaank for such an elaborate & honest feedback!! Truly appreciate it! Hope you are doing well!! Best regards.

tags: None
context: Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: This was my first time visit with Dr. Rachna at Smilestones clinic.  I flew into India with my 3 n half year old daughter Monique especially for her appointment at Smilestones with Dr. Rachna.  It was Monique's first time ever dental visit and naturally I was scared how Monique will deal with it and I didn't wanna leave disappointed and both my fears disappeared the moment I met Dr. Rachna.  Dr. Rachna made Monique feel at home.  Dr. Rachna was playful with Monique so she had Monique in her trust and confidence. Dr Rachna was very caring,  very professional, very patient and very co.operative throughout the entire procedure. Dr. Jeevan (owner of Smilestones) also helped Dr. Rachna to have Monique's attention. They played good team to make my visit complete success.  Monique at the end of the day was showstopper for her complete cooperation and patience and for that I have my big thanks to Dr. Rachna for her complete dedication and Dr. Jeevan to play parts in having Monique's on and off drifted attention. Monique left the clinic with 2 cement filling on her right grinders and 2 silver crowns on her left grinders. Moreover Monique left the clinic with big smiles and 2 bright stars on each hand and me with lasting inner peace. Smilestones definitely lives up to its name.  Biggg thanks to Dr. Rachna and Dr. Jeevan. ****** ******** *** ***** *** **** **** ******* ******  The impact you had on Monique was so beautiful and lasting.  She still thinks and remembers you as Dr. Aunty.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Since my daughter was 4 years old, I have consulted Dr Rachana Bhama for my daughter's dental treatment. Dr Rachana is super cool and have so much patience to deal with kids. In my recent visit we again had a very good experience. She explained the treatment need and procedure well, made my 7 year old daughter comfortable and completed the treatment in 2 sessions. Not only this but she also explained the proper care routine to follow. I found her knowledgeable specifically with filling materials and overall procedure.
reply_text: Thank you ma’am it was a pleasure treating your daughter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very friendly doctor. She listens to you patiently and explains everything clearly. I went to her for my daughter (4.5 years old). I was very worried about how my daughter would react as she was visiting a dentist for the first time. But the doctor is so good in dealing with children; she indulged her into some activities (magic chair), talking etc. and treated her tooth which had developed cavity. To be honest, the overall experience turned out to be very smooth and totally opposite of what I was worried about. The doctor showed us how to brush her teeth properly to avoid cavity in future.
reply_text: Thank you Tanu for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good Friendly Doctor, very short waiting time. Good ambience & helpful staff. Clear guidance for treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to thank dr rachna bhama for her patience and friendly behavior as I was late was stuck in traffic  I was nervous but the warm welcome I received was happy and immediately she began with her treatment and after inspecting my teeth she explained me what is my dental conditions she fixed my jaw which was not matching she gave the perfect shape. I would like to recommend her for her excellent work thanks DR Rachna Bhama.
reply_text: Thank you David . Appreciate your kind words & I am sure you will be on time next time :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Rachana Bhama for my regular dental check-up. She thoroughly explained me everything in detail I needed to know, followed by scaling & polishing. Very gentle and precise indeed. And all of this with a smile and friendliness throughout. A perfect Smile Doctor who would make you all Smile :-) Extremely happy with the treatment, and highly recommended. More power to you!
reply_text: Thank you Mr. Amit . Truly appreciate your kind words. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My son ishan was thoroughly comfortable with Dr. Rachana  Bhama . Very nicely she made him understand the pitfalls in  his tooth cleaning ways and gave him some small but important  tips to improve it.He is following it till today.  She swiftly did some essential fillings required in his case.  . She sounded very reassuring and loving  doctor. A perfect package  for kids. 
Thanks Dr. Rachana
Uma Bhartiya
reply_text:
Thank you for such a wonderful feedback! Great to know ishan is following the regime!! Truly appreciate it!! 
You are most welcome !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rachna treated my 5 year old who had developed yellowish teeth. She explained the issue very well and also the course of the treatment. To top it all her patience with the kid was commendable. My kid became very friendly with her and got her cavity fillings done without any issue. I would highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you! Truly appreciate your feedback.

tags: None
review: The procedure was very good. I was exposed to lot of potential problems which could be avoided.Definitely looking forward to fix the remaining problems. The dentist is absolutely professional and up to the task. She is punctual and dedicated to the cause. Finally to sum up a pleasant experience and urge to keep visiting regularly for healthy mouth. Thanks a lot Doctor.☺
